text: Pyrulofusus is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Buccinidae, the true whelks. ==Species== Species within the genus Pyrulofusus include: * Pyrulofusus deformis (Reeve, 1847) ==References== ==External links== * Category:Buccinidae Category:Monotypic gastropod genera
title: Pyrulofusus
